member.summary: Contains extensions for and .

member.summary: Sets the help provider for the application.
member.returns: A configurator that can be used to configure the application further.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.Cli.ConfiguratorExtensions.SetHelpProvider``1(Spectre.Console.Cli.IConfigurator)
member.summary: Sets the help provider for the application.
member.typeparam: The type of the help provider to instantiate at runtime and use.
member.returns: A configurator that can be used to configure the application further.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.Cli.ConfiguratorExtensions.SetApplicationCulture(Spectre.Console.Cli.IConfigurator,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Sets the culture for the application.
member.returns: A configurator that can be used to configure the application further.
member.remarks: Text displayed by can be localised, but defaults to English. Setting the application culture informs the resource manager which culture to use when fetching strings. English will be used when a culture has not been specified or a string has not been localised for the specified culture.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.Cli.ConfiguratorExtensions.SetApplicationName(Spectre.Console.Cli.IConfigurator,System.String)

member.name: T:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings
member.summary: Represents a command line application settings.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture.
member.remarks: Text displayed by can be localised, but defaults to English. Setting this property informs the resource manager which culture to use when fetching strings. English will be used when a culture has not been specified (ie. this property is null) or a string has not been localised for the specified culture.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the application name.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the application version (use it to override auto-detected value).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how many examples from direct children to show in the help text.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ShowOptionDefaultValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any default values for command options are shown in the help text.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.TrimTrailingPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a trailing period of a command description is trimmed in the help text.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.HelpProviderStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets the styles to used when rendering the help text.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.Console
member.summary: Gets or sets the .

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.Interceptor
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to intercept settings before it's being sent to the command.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.Registrar
member.summary: Gets the type registrar.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.CaseSensitivity
member.summary: Gets or sets case sensitivity.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.StrictParsing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not parsing is strict.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ConvertFlagsToRemainingArguments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not flags found on the commnd line that would normally result in a being thrown during parsing with the message "Flags cannot be assigned a value." should instead be added to the remaining arguments collection.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.PropagateExceptions
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not exceptions should be propagated.
Setting this to true will disable default Exception handling and any , if set.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ValidateExamples
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not examples should be validated.

member.name: P:Spectre.Console.Cli.ICommandAppSettings.ExceptionHandler
member.summary:
Gets or sets a handler for Exceptions.
This handler will not be called, if is set to true. The argument will only be not-null, when the exception occurs during execution of a command. I.e. only when the resolver is available.
